phases.name: SDK Adoption
phases.description: Adopt the MCP SDK and integrate it into the existing codebase

phases.name: Protocol Conformance
phases.description: Ensure that all components conform to the MCP protocol

phases.name: Testing and Validation
phases.description: Test and validate the MCP implementation

phases.name: Documentation and Training
phases.description: Create documentation and training materials for the MCP implementation

phases.name: Deployment
phases.description: Deploy the MCP implementation to production

tasks.name: Install MCP SDK
tasks.description: Install the MCP SDK and its dependencies

risk_assessment.description: SDK might have compatibility issues with existing dependencies
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Test SDK installation in a separate environment first
risk_assessment.impact: Delay in SDK adoption

tasks.name: Configure MCP SDK
tasks.description: Configure the MCP SDK for the project

risk_assessment.description: Configuration might require changes to existing code
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Create a configuration adapter layer
risk_assessment.impact: Increased complexity in the codebase

tasks.name: Create SDK Integration Tests
tasks.description: Create tests to verify SDK integration

risk_assessment.description: Test coverage might be incomplete
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Use test coverage tools to ensure comprehensive testing
risk_assessment.impact: Potential issues might be missed during testing

tasks.name: Analyze Protocol Requirements
tasks.description: Analyze the MCP protocol requirements and identify gaps in the current implementation

risk_assessment.description: Protocol requirements might be misunderstood
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Consult with MCP experts and review protocol documentation thoroughly
risk_assessment.impact: Incorrect implementation of protocol conformance

tasks.name: Implement JSON-RPC Handling
tasks.description: Implement JSON-RPC handling according to the MCP protocol

risk_assessment.description: JSON-RPC implementation might have edge cases
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Implement comprehensive error handling and validation
risk_assessment.impact: Protocol conformance issues

tasks.name: Create Protocol Conformance Tests
tasks.description: Create tests to verify protocol conformance

risk_assessment.description: Test coverage might miss edge cases
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Use property-based testing and fuzzing
risk_assessment.impact: Protocol conformance issues might be missed

tasks.name: Implement Host Core
tasks.description: Implement the core functionality of the MCP Host component

risk_assessment.description: Host implementation is complex and critical
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Break down implementation into smaller, testable units
risk_assessment.impact: Delay in the entire migration process

tasks.name: Implement Consent Manager
tasks.description: Implement the consent management functionality of the MCP Host

risk_assessment.description: Consent management has security implications
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Implement with security best practices and thorough testing
risk_assessment.impact: Security vulnerabilities in consent management

tasks.name: Implement Context Manager
tasks.description: Implement the context management functionality of the MCP Host

risk_assessment.description: Context management is complex and critical for proper operation
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Implement with clear interfaces and thorough testing
risk_assessment.impact: Improper context management leading to operational issues

tasks.name: Implement Server Registry
tasks.description: Implement the server registry functionality of the MCP Host

risk_assessment.description: Server registry needs to handle dynamic registration and deregistration
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Implement with thread-safety and proper error handling
risk_assessment.impact: Issues with server registration and discovery

tasks.name: Implement Client Registry
tasks.description: Implement the client registry functionality of the MCP Host

risk_assessment.description: Client registry needs to handle dynamic registration and deregistration
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Implement with thread-safety and proper error handling
risk_assessment.impact: Issues with client registration and discovery

tasks.name: Create Host Unit Tests
tasks.description: Create unit tests for the MCP Host component

risk_assessment.description: Test coverage might be incomplete
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Use test coverage tools and code reviews
risk_assessment.impact: Bugs in the Host component might be missed

tasks.name: Implement Client Core
tasks.description: Implement the core functionality of the MCP Client component

risk_assessment.description: Client implementation is complex and depends on Host
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Ensure clear interfaces with Host and thorough testing
risk_assessment.impact: Delay in the migration process

tasks.name: Implement Subscription Manager
tasks.description: Implement the subscription management functionality of the MCP Client

risk_assessment.description: Subscription management is complex and critical for resource updates
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Implement with clear interfaces and thorough testing
risk_assessment.impact: Issues with resource subscriptions and updates

tasks.name: Implement Request Handler
tasks.description: Implement the request handling functionality of the MCP Client

risk_assessment.description: Request handling needs to be robust and handle errors properly
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Implement with proper error handling and validation
risk_assessment.impact: Issues with request handling and routing

tasks.name: Implement Response Handler
tasks.description: Implement the response handling functionality of the MCP Client

risk_assessment.description: Response handling needs to be robust and handle errors properly
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Implement with proper error handling and validation
risk_assessment.impact: Issues with response handling and routing

tasks.name: Create Client Unit Tests
tasks.description: Create unit tests for the MCP Client component

risk_assessment.description: Test coverage might be incomplete
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Use test coverage tools and code reviews
risk_assessment.impact: Bugs in the Client component might be missed

tasks.name: Implement Server Core
tasks.description: Implement the core functionality of the MCP Server component

risk_assessment.description: Server implementation is complex and depends on Client and Host
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Ensure clear interfaces with Client and Host and thorough testing
risk_assessment.impact: Delay in the migration process

tasks.name: Implement Capability Manager
tasks.description: Implement the capability management functionality of the MCP Server

risk_assessment.description: Capability management is complex and critical for proper operation
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Implement with clear interfaces and thorough testing
risk_assessment.impact: Issues with capability discovery and execution

tasks.name: Create Server Unit Tests
tasks.description: Create unit tests for the MCP Server component

risk_assessment.description: Test coverage might be incomplete
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Use test coverage tools and code reviews
risk_assessment.impact: Bugs in the Server component might be missed

tasks.name: Implement Tools Registry
tasks.description: Implement the tools registry functionality

risk_assessment.description: Tools registry needs to handle dynamic registration and discovery
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Implement with clear interfaces and thorough testing
risk_assessment.impact: Issues with tool discovery and execution

tasks.name: Implement Resources Registry
tasks.description: Implement the resources registry functionality

risk_assessment.description: Resources registry needs to handle dynamic registration and discovery
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Implement with clear interfaces and thorough testing
risk_assessment.impact: Issues with resource discovery and access

tasks.name: Implement Shell Tool
tasks.description: Implement the shell command tool

risk_assessment.description: Shell tool has security implications
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Implement with security best practices and proper sandboxing
risk_assessment.impact: Security vulnerabilities in shell command execution

tasks.name: Implement File Resource
tasks.description: Implement the file resource provider

risk_assessment.description: File resource has security implications
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Implement with security best practices and proper access control
risk_assessment.impact: Security vulnerabilities in file access

tasks.name: Create Tools and Resources Unit Tests
tasks.description: Create unit tests for tools and resources

risk_assessment.description: Test coverage might be incomplete
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Use test coverage tools and code reviews
risk_assessment.impact: Bugs in tools and resources might be missed

tasks.name: Design Security Model
tasks.description: Design the security model for the MCP implementation

risk_assessment.description: Security model is critical for the overall system security
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Consult with security experts and follow security best practices
risk_assessment.impact: Security vulnerabilities in the MCP implementation

tasks.name: Implement Authentication
tasks.description: Implement authentication for the MCP implementation

risk_assessment.description: Authentication is critical for the overall system security
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Implement with security best practices and thorough testing
risk_assessment.impact: Security vulnerabilities in authentication

tasks.name: Implement Authorization
tasks.description: Implement authorization for the MCP implementation

risk_assessment.description: Authorization is critical for the overall system security
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Implement with security best practices and thorough testing
risk_assessment.impact: Security vulnerabilities in authorization

tasks.name: Create Security Unit Tests
tasks.description: Create unit tests for the security model

risk_assessment.description: Test coverage might be incomplete
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Use test coverage tools and security-focused code reviews
risk_assessment.impact: Security vulnerabilities might be missed

tasks.name: Create Integration Tests
tasks.description: Create integration tests for the MCP implementation

risk_assessment.description: Integration tests might not cover all scenarios
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Use test coverage tools and thorough test planning
risk_assessment.impact: Integration issues might be missed

tasks.name: Create End-to-End Tests
tasks.description: Create end-to-end tests for the MCP implementation

risk_assessment.description: End-to-end tests might not cover all scenarios
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Use test coverage tools and thorough test planning
risk_assessment.impact: End-to-end issues might be missed

tasks.name: Create Performance Tests
tasks.description: Create performance tests for the MCP implementation

risk_assessment.description: Performance tests might not cover all scenarios
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Use performance testing tools and thorough test planning
risk_assessment.impact: Performance issues might be missed

tasks.name: Run Conformance Tests
tasks.description: Run conformance tests for the MCP implementation

risk_assessment.description: Conformance tests might not pass
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Address all issues found during testing
risk_assessment.impact: Non-conformant MCP implementation

tasks.name: Create User Documentation
tasks.description: Create user documentation for the MCP implementation

risk_assessment.description: Documentation might be incomplete
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Review documentation thoroughly
risk_assessment.impact: Users might not understand how to use the MCP implementation

tasks.name: Create Developer Documentation
tasks.description: Create developer documentation for the MCP implementation

risk_assessment.description: Documentation might be incomplete
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Review documentation thoroughly
risk_assessment.impact: Developers might not understand how to extend the MCP implementation

tasks.name: Create Training Materials
tasks.description: Create training materials for the MCP implementation

risk_assessment.description: Training materials might be incomplete
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Review training materials thoroughly
risk_assessment.impact: Users and developers might not be properly trained

tasks.name: Create Deployment Plan
tasks.description: Create a deployment plan for the MCP implementation

risk_assessment.description: Deployment plan might be incomplete
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Review deployment plan thoroughly
risk_assessment.impact: Deployment might fail

tasks.name: Set Up CI/CD Pipeline
tasks.description: Set up a CI/CD pipeline for the MCP implementation

risk_assessment.description: CI/CD pipeline might have issues
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Test the pipeline thoroughly
risk_assessment.impact: Automated deployment might fail

tasks.name: Deploy to Production
tasks.description: Deploy the MCP implementation to production

risk_assessment.description: Production deployment might fail
risk_assessment.mitigation_strategy: Test the deployment thoroughly in staging
risk_assessment.impact: Production environment might be affected

dependencies.description: Task task_analyze_protocol depends on task task_sdk_tests
Task task_implement_host_core depends on task task_protocol_tests
Task task_implement_client_core depends on task task_host_unit_tests
Task task_implement_server_core depends on task task_client_unit_tests
Task task_implement_tools_registry depends on task task_server_unit_tests
Task task_implement_resources_registry depends on task task_server_unit_tests
Task task_design_security_model depends on task task_host_unit_tests
Task task_design_security_model depends on task task_client_unit_tests
Task task_design_security_model depends on task task_server_unit_tests
Task task_create_integration_tests depends on task task_tools_resources_tests
Task task_create_integration_tests depends on task task_security_tests
Task task_create_user_docs depends on task task_run_conformance_tests
Task task_create_dev_docs depends on task task_run_conformance_tests
Task task_create_deployment_plan depends on task task_create_training
